mapper.select: select DISTINCT i.company_code as companyCode, i.item_code as itemCode,i.item_name as itemName,i.item_no as itemNo,i.item_specification as itemSpecification,i.client_code as clientCode,i.client_name as clientName,p.start_date as startDate,p.end_date as endDate,p.buy_price as buyPrice,p.sales_price as salesPrice,p.memo,p.useyn,i.item_category as itemCategory from ma_item_price p, ma_item i ,ma_client_company c where p.item_code=i.item_code AND p.useyn='Y' AND i.company_code=#{companyCode} order by i.item_code

select DISTINCT i.company_code as companyCode, i.item_code as itemCode,i.item_name as itemName,i.item_no as itemNo,i.item_specification as itemSpecification,i.client_code as clientCode,i.client_name as clientName ,p.start_date as startDate,p.end_date as endDate,p.buy_price as buyPrice,p.sales_price as salesPrice,p.memo,p.useyn,i.item_category as itemCategory from ma_item_price p,ma_item i ,ma_client_company c where COALESCE(i.item_category, '') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.itemCategory}, '%') AND COALESCE(i.item_code, '') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.itemCode}, '%') AND COALESCE(i.item_name, '') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.itemName}, '%') AND COALESCE(i.item_no, '') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.itemNo}, '%') AND COALESCE(i.item_specification, '') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.itemSpecification}, '%') AND COALESCE(c.client_code, '') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.clientCode}, '%') AND COALESCE(c.client_name, '') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.clientName}, '%') AND p.item_code=i.item_code AND p.useyn='Y' AND i.company_code=#{companyCode}
order by i.item_code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ma_item_price(company_code,item_category,item_code,item_name, item_no, item_specification, client_code, client_name,start_date,end_date, buy_price,sales_price,memo,useyn) values (#{companyCode}, #{elements.itemCategory}, #{elements.itemCode}, #{elements.itemName}, #{elements.itemNo}, #{elements.itemSpecification}, #{elements.clientCode}, #{elements.clientName},#{elements.startDate},#{elements.endDate},#{elements.buyPrice},#{elements.salesPrice},#{elements.memo},#{elements.useyn})
